    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuItem

        public MenuItem(int itemNo,
                java.lang.String name,
                float price)
        Creates a new menu item. You must add this item to the menu after creating a new instance.
        Parameters:
        itemNo - The item number (Unique ID)
        name - The name of the item
        price - The price per unit for the item
